title: Van der Poel Makes it Look Easy vs. Van Aert, Pidcock in ‘Big 3’ CX Thriller
content:
Gavere CX: Van der Poel untouchable in muddy course, Pidcock mounts late comeback to hit third behind Van Aert: 'Nothing that can be done about Mathieu van der Poel.'

Read the full article at Van der Poel Makes it Look Easy vs. Van Aert, Pidcock in ‘Big 3’ CX Thriller on Velo.
author: ahood
